DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective was to assess the effect of 3-month treatment of low and standard doses of fenofibrate in combination with stable dose of metformin on fasting triglycerides levels in patients with type 2 diabetes and dyslipidemia.
DOC.brief_title: Fenofibrate in Dyslipidemia and Metformin-Controlled Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Type 1 diabetes, uncontrolled type 2 diabetes, HbA1c â‰¥ 10 % Fasting plasma glucose > 300 mg/dL Triglycerides > 500 mg/dL
DOC.keyword: Treatment of Dyslipidemia and of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
